head.title: A Bid From Cendant Boosts Avis Shares 20%

hedline.hl1: A Bid From Cendant Boosts Avis Shares 20%

abstract.p: Price of Avis Group shares soars after former owner, Cendant, makes $742 million offer (S)

block.p: The price of Avis Group shares (NYSE: AVI) soared last week after Cendant, the international hotel franchiser and Avis's former owner, made a $742 million offer for the company.

Cendant, which owns 18 percent of Avis's common shares, offered to buy the remaining 25.6 million for $29 each. The news drove Avis's stock up 20 percent on Tuesday, to over $30. Analysts attributed the surge to the perception that Cendant would raise its offer; its news release described the $29 bid as preliminary.
